channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Diving Into Spec-Driven Development With GitHub Spec Kit】通过GitHub规格套件潜入规格驱动的开发
item.description: 【Developers are increasingly relying on AI agents to both build new software as well as extend capabilities of existing projects that they support. One challenge with AI-based systems, however, is that to produce the right output you need to first establish really good context. If you don't decide what you're building and why you're bu】开发人员越来越依靠AI代理来构建新软件，并扩展了他们支持的现有项目的功能。但是，基于AI的系统的一个挑战是，要产生正确的输出，您首先建立了非常好的上下文。如果您不决定要建造的内容以及为什么

item.title: 【Python in Visual Studio Code - September 2025 Release】Visual Studio代码中的Python- 2025年9月发布
item.description: 【We're excited to announce the September 2025 release of the Python, Pylance and Jupyter】我们很高兴宣布2025年9月的Python，Pylance和Jupyter发布

item.title: 【Application Insights Code Optimizations for .NET Apps】应用程序见解.NET应用程序的代码优化
item.description: 【As engineers we know how frustrating it can be to chase and fix performance issues without clear guidance. That’s why we built Application Insights Code Optimizations — to give you actionable insights, reduce the guesswork, and help you focus on what you do best: building great software.】作为工程师，我们知道在没有明确指导的情况下追逐和解决绩效问题会有多么令人沮丧。这就是为什么我们构建了应用程序见解代码优化的原因 - 为您提供可行的见解，减少猜测并帮助您专注于最佳的工作：构建出色的软件。

item.title: 【Why is the name of the Microsoft Wireless Notebook Presenter Mouse 8000 hard-coded into the Bluetooth drivers?】为什么Microsoft Wireless笔记本电脑主持人鼠标的名称8000在蓝牙驱动程序中进行了硬编码？
item.description: 【Some time ago, people noticed that buried in the Windows Bluetooth drivers is the hard-coded name of the Microsoft Wireless Notebook Presenter Mouse 8000. What's going on there? Does the Microsoft Wireless Notebook Presenter Mouse 8000 receive favorable treatment from the Microsoft Bluetooth drivers? Is this some sort of collusion?】不久前，人们注意到埋在Windows蓝牙驱动程序中的是Microsoft Wireless Notebook主持人Mouse 8000的硬编码名称。那里发生了什么？ Microsoft Wireless Notebook主持人Mouse 8000是否从Microsoft蓝牙驱动程序获得有利的治疗方法？这是某种勾结吗？

item.title: 【Introducing auto model selection (preview)】引入自动模型选择（预览）
item.description: 【Use auto model selection in VS Code to get faster responses, reduced rate limiting, and a 10% discount on premium requests for paid users. Read the full article】在VS代码中使用自动模型选择，以获得更快的响应，降低的利率限制以及付费用户的高级请求折扣10％。阅读全文

item.title: 【How can I convert a third party in-process server so it runs in the COM surrogate?】如何转换第三方过程中的服务器，以便在COM代理中运行？
item.description: 【A customer had an app with a plugin model based on vendor-supplied COM objects that are loaded into the process via Co­Create­Instance. Main process】客户的应用程序具有基于供应商提供的com对象的插件模型，该应用程序通过cocreateinStance加载到该过程中。主要过程
